translation.welcomeText1: Discover the path that inspires you and build the future you deserve.
translation.welcomeText2: Take our vocational test and explore and discover the best Brazilian universities to start your journey!
translation.aboutText1: We are VOCCO, a platform that helps high school students from public schools choose their future careers.
translation.aboutText2: Our name comes from VOCATION in Latin, showing that we are here to help you connect with your future!
translation.faqText1: A career test is a tool that helps you identify your skills, interests and abilities, suggesting possible careers and areas of study that align with your profile.
translation.faqTitleText2: How does the vocational test work?
translation.faqText2: The test consists of a series of questions about your interests, skills and preferences. Based on your answers, it generates a report with suggestions for careers and courses that are suitable for you.
translation.faqTitleText3: How can I contact a specific university?
translation.faqText3: Each university page includes contact details such as address, telephone and email. You can also find links to the universities' official websites.
translation.faqTitleText4: How to create an account on the website?
translation.faqText4: Click on the 'Register' button in the center of the first page and fill in the form with your personal information.
translation.faqTitleText5: How can I save my searches and test results?
translation.faqText5: After creating an account, logging in and carrying out a test, you will have the test results saved on your page, accessible at any time.
translation.jonhHollandContent: Our vocational test is inspired by psychologist John L. Holland's theory, which maps six personality types and work environments, called RIASEC.
translation.jonhHollandContent2: When you take the test, we match your style with these types to discover the professions and areas of study that suit you, so you can find yourself and do well in your career.
translation.realistaContent: Esse perfil é prático e adora colocar a mão na massa...
translation.realistaContent2: Com essas habilidades, você se dá bem em áreas como engenharia, construção e mais.
translation.investigativoContent: Esse perfil adora resolver problemas complexos...
translation.investigativoContent2: Carreiras em ciência e pesquisa são ótimas opções.
translation.artisticoContent: Esse perfil é criativo e tem uma veia artística...
translation.artisticoContent2: Áreas como design, música e arte são perfeitas para você.
translation.socialContent: Esse perfil é prático e adora colocar a mão na massa...
translation.socialContent2: Com essas habilidades, você se dá bem em áreas como engenharia, construção e mais.
translation.empreendedorContent: This profile is pure charisma and leadership. They are people full of energy, who enjoy being in charge and know how to influence others with their decisions and attitudes.
translation.empreendedorContent2: With these skills, they do well in areas such as marketing, management, and so on.
translation.convencionalContent: Esse perfil é prático e adora colocar a mão na massa...
translation.convencionalContent2: Com essas habilidades, você se dá bem em áreas como engenharia, construção e mais.
translation.loginText: Enter your e-mail and password to access our platform.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
translation.loginError: The e-mail or password entered was not found :(
translation.forgotText: To reset your password, enter your registered e-mail and we will quickly send you a link! Don't forget to check your spam folder ;)
translation.testIntro1: Our vocational test is inspired by psychologist John L. Holland's theory, known as RIASEC - Realistic, Investigative, Artistic, Social, Enterprising and Conventional.
translation.testIntro2: This theory divides people into six different personality types and work environments. When taking the test, your characteristics are compared with these six types to suggest careers and areas of study that match your profile.
translation.testIntro3: Furthermore, we use this information to help you find courses and universities that fit your profile, increasing your chances of feeling fulfilled and successful in your professional career.
translation.testInstruction: Respond to the statements below with how much you identify with each of them.
translation.testWarningTitle: Are you sure you want to leave?
translation.testWarning: Your current responses will not be saved if you exit now.
translation.dashboardCard1: Take our quiz and get access to six personalized courses.
translation.dashboardCard2Text: Discover your profile by taking a test.
translation.dashboardInvestigativo: Pessoas com este perfil são curiosas, analíticas e gostam de resolver problemas.
translation.dashboardConvencional: Pessoas com este perfil são organizadas, metódicas e preferem trabalhar com dados e detalhes.
translation.dashboardEmpreendedor: Pessoas com este perfil são líderes naturais, gostam de persuadir e influenciar os outros.
translation.dashboardRealista: Pessoas com este perfil são práticas, gostam de trabalhar com as mãos e preferem atividades físicas e mecânicas.
translation.dashboardArtistico: Pessoas com este perfil são criativas, gostam de se expressar através de diferentes formas de arte.
translation.dashboardSocial: Pessoas com este perfil são comunicativas, gostam de ajudar os outros e preferem atividades que envolvem interação interpessoal.
